title: Axiomatic Design-Based Instructional Design for Enhancing Marine Safety and Crisis Response Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic marine safety terminology and proficiency in computer/internet use
context.additional_context: Customized training program for systematically acquiring practical competencies required in high-risk environments

learning_goals: Learners develop the ability to analyze uncertainty in marine work environments by applying fuzzy set theory
Learners can systematically derive functional requirements when designing marine safety protocols using axiomatic design methodology
Learners perform decision-making processes in marine emergency situations with over 90% accuracy through virtual simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
